languages.text: {n}Монтэг сноровисто осматривает оружие с видом знатока.{/n} "Интересная штука. Найдж прав — за такое могут казнить весь отсек, так что неудивительно, что ваши злодеи так тщательно скрываются".
{n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг сноровисто осматривает оружие с видом знатока.{/n} "Интересная штука. Найдж прав — за такое могут казнить весь отсек, так что неудивительно, что ваши злодеи так тщательно скрываются".

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

{n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. It's obviously handmade — actually, it was made in this very compartment. The markings on the parts match those found on the machines here. Someone has been cobbling together weapons. That's a serious crime that could get a whole bay executed. No wonder your scoundrels are so cautious."
{n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

{n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. It's obviously handmade — actually, it was made in this very compartment. The markings on the parts match those found on the machines here. Someone has been cobbling together weapons. That's a serious crime that could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

{n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

languages.text: {n}Einrich examina con destreza el arma.{/n} «Interesante. Nije tiene razón, con esto bastaría para justificar la ejecución de todo el compartimento. No me sorprende que estos rufianes sean tan cuidadosos».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich examina con destreza el arma.{/n} «Interesante. Nije tiene razón, con esto bastaría para justificar la ejecución de todo el compartimento. No me sorprende que estos rufianes sean tan cuidadosos».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは巧みに武器を調べる。{/n}「興味深い。インフェルヌス・マスターの言う通りだ — これがあればベイ丸一つが処刑される可能性がある。あの悪党たちがこんなに用心深いのも無理はない。」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは巧みに武器を調べる。{/n}「興味深い。インフェルヌス・マスターの言う通りだ — これがあればベイ丸一つが処刑される可能性がある。あの悪党たちがこんなに用心深いのも無理はない。」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇熟练地检查着武器。{/n}“很有趣。尼杰说得没错，这可是相当严重的罪行，足以让整片甲板的人遭到处决。难怪这些渣滓这么谨慎。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇熟练地检查着武器。{/n}“很有趣。尼杰说得没错，这可是相当严重的罪行，足以让整片甲板的人遭到处决。难怪这些渣滓这么谨慎。”

languages.text: {n}Einrich untersucht geschickt die Waffe.{/n} "Interessant. Nije hat recht ... dafür könnte ein ganzes Modul hingerichtet werden. Kein Wunder, dass diese Halunken so vorsichtig sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich untersucht geschickt die Waffe.{/n} "Interessant. Nije hat recht ... dafür könnte ein ganzes Modul hingerichtet werden. Kein Wunder, dass diese Halunken so vorsichtig sind."

languages.text: {n}Einrich examine l'arme d'un œil expert.{/n} « Intéressant. Nije a raison. Ceci pourrait se solder par l'exécution d'une division entière. Pas étonnant que ces scélérats aient pris autant de précautions. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich examine l'arme d'un œil expert.{/n} « Intéressant. Nije a raison. Ceci pourrait se solder par l'exécution d'une division entière. Pas étonnant que ces scélérats aient pris autant de précautions. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich, ustalıkla silahı inceliyor.{/n} "İlginç. Nije haklı. Bu, tüm bölmenin toptan infaz edilmesine sebep olabilir. O alçakların böylesine dikkatli olmalarına şaşırmamalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich deftly examines the weapon.{/n} "Interesting. Nije is right — this could get a whole bay executed. No wonder these scoundrels are so cautious."
